title: Season 4: Gear:Unknown
description: The current operational season. A mystery-themed tech sprint focused on uncovering hidden potential and rapid prototyping in unknown territories.

title: Season 3: UIT26
description: A month dedicated to the 'University IT Carnival 2026'. Preps, execution, and aftermath of our biggest annual fest involving 50+ universities.

title: Season 2: TripWare
description: Focused on cybersecurity and ethical hacking. Members engaged in CTF challenges, digital forensics workshops, and safety seminars.

title: Season 1: Origin
description: The genesis of our new structure. Establishing the executive committee, onboarding members, and setting the club's core values.

title: Session 4: Deployment Mastery
description: Learn the essentials of deploying a static website using modern tools like GitHub and Netlify. Go from local project to live on the web.

title: Session 3: Web Dev Basics
description: Your journey into web development starts here. We'll cover the foundational blocks: HTML for structure, CSS for style, and a touch of JavaScript.

title: Build Your Portfolio!
description: A challenge featuring VSCode, Github, Netlify, Grok AI for building a personal online portfolio to showcase your skills.

title: Online Session: Logistics
description: Our first online session covering club logistics, discord setup, and planning future activities in a virtual space.

title: The Genesis Session
description: Our inaugural in-person session where we introduced ULIC, its vision, and welcomed our founding members.
